message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.NI, cs.SE

This paper discusses vulnerabilities in blockchain platforms and proposes mitigation measures against double-spend attacks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also involves distributed systems and algorithms, which could fall under cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The use of network infrastructure and communication protocols could also place the paper in cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Finally, the proposal of mitigation measures could fall under cs.SE (Software Engineering).
